metadata.title: Service router configuration entry reference
metadata.description: Service router configuration entries are L7 traffic management tools for redirecting requests for a service to a particular instance or set of instances. Learn how to write `service-router` config entries in HCL or YAML with a specification reference, configuration model, a complete example, and example code by use case.

metadata.title: Consul by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Consul is a service networking solution to automate network configurations, discover services, and enable secure connectivity across any cloud or runtime.
